title: Slow Cooker Mac 'n' Cheese Recipe Read Reviews (49) Be the first to add a review 4 49 54
directions: Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain. Place in a 5-qt. slow cooker; add butter. In a large bowl, mix 3 cups cheese, evaporated milk, condensed soup, 2% milk and eggs. Pour over macaroni mixture; stir to combine. Cook, covered, on low 3-1/2 to 4 hours or until a thermometer reads at least 160Â°.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Cook, covered, on low 15-20 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with paprika. Yield: 10 servings.
ingredients: 4 cups (16 ounces) shredded cheddar cheese, divided
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cheddar cheese soup, undiluted
